snippet: Mr. Llana, who recently played Ferdinand Marcos in the musical “Here Lies Love,” projected a keen resolve to be himself in a concert at the Stanley H. Kaplan Penthouse.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by singer Jose Llana at Stanley H Kaplan Penthouse as part of American Songbook series.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Llana, who recently played Ferdinand Marcos in the musical “Here Lies Love,” projected a keen resolve to be himself in a concert at the Stanley H. Kaplan Penthouse.

headline.main: Review: Jose Llana Radiates Youthful Bravado in ‘American Songbook’
headline.print_headline: Exuberance of an Icarus Who Thrives in the Sun
